Question.Subject: how can I meet someone twice on chatroulette or got my conversations back ?
Question.Content: On a friday night I had a wonderful conversation me Sultan with Chloe ( or Chole ) on Chatroulette . It was the first one I had and the last because we agreed not to back to that bad chat again . It was full of naked and sick old men . Unfortunately I went out without recalling saving" Chole" skype . Now I have nothing to contact her again . May be this is stupid but is there anyway to get your conversation back ?.. Many thanks
Question.ChosenAnswer:
if you cleared it there is no way... you could look through your flash cookies if they are still there although very unlucky.. sorry.
http://camstumble.com has ways of getting back in touch which chat roulette doesn't.
